messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] new group - homebased business and unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/6/00 11:12:19 PM Central Daylight Time, NumoAstro@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/6/00 11:12:19 PM Central Daylight Time,
NumoAstro@... writes:

<< Just wanted to let you know about a new e-group I've started. Its for
people
who have home based businesses and also unschool. Several people have
e-mailed me privately about this and so I just went ahead and set it up!!
Hope to chat with some of you there as well as here.

>>
Hi Dawn, I joined the group today-- I sent a post to let you know! I look
forward to being a part and learning how I could maybe work from home
successfully. Thanks. ~Karen
